S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-5866: Triggers fire out of order
In order to avoid ambiguities around switch from daylight saving time to standard time, and other time zone changes, store the trigger creation timestamps in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) instead of the local time zone.
Only use UTC if the database has been upgraded to 10.11 format, so that the change won't cause problems on downgrade.
